transcript.text: well Shalom Shalom this is my third part
of the three-part series of being here
at PSU so I went inside I read a couple
chapters in Ezekiel and just was praying
an opening for divine appointments but
there's been actual absolutely none no
divine appointments at all so it's kind
of discouraging but um you know I just
don't think that there's any point in
coming back here anymore this is now my
18th day here at PSU and I preached the
gospel for 17 days got in the newspaper
everyone seems to know who I am and no
one wants to talk to me so I guess this
is just evidence that the house going to
bring judgment the spirit of judgments
going to come on psu and every single
building it's going to be devastated by
the coming earthquake that's going to
destroy everything from Seattle down to
Northern California I don't know when
the earthquake is going to come but I
know it's going to be sometime between
now and the fall 2017 so I ran my race I
did my job I'm going to take my gospel
elsewhere now not my gospel gospel of
Yahshua I'm going to take it to pioneer
courthouse square downtown Portland
there's going to be a lot of places to
preach especially with the pagan and
Christmas holidays coming out with
shoppers everywhere lots of crowds so I
think it's what i'm gonna do from now on
I am prohibited from coming to psu after
january first 2014 my psu security
informed me that because my ex-wife is
going to be enrolling as a student here
at psu beginning in the winter quarter
and she has a no contact order with me I
have to not come here anymore so which
is fine because I think on December the
28th everything's going to be devastated
anyway so i don't think i don't think i
don't think i'll be doing much open air
preaching after that date anyway
depending on what actually manifests
when Satan gets thrown out of heaven
down to earth but whether I had that
prophecy or not it looks like this is it
this is it so like I said I was going to
come here for finals week but this week
has just been told this day's just been
totally a bomb I mean other than passing
out a few cards and putting the cards
out on the visitor's desk and the and
the front entrance near the cafeteria
and hopefully people will grab those
cards but otherwise there's just no
point well hallelujah I did my best I
fought the good fight and now it's time
to go reach the rest of downtown
Portland Shalom will be meeting tonight
at 5pm Pacific 8 p.m. Eastern for our
skype gathering please come and join its
prayer and bible study and it will be
very edifying I need your skype ID and i
can give you mine and plug into the
video conference this is daniel john lee
with tour restoration ministries
websites ww spirit and tour com
